Welcome to KBCT Boca Raton Airport in Microsoft Flight Simulator! ğŸŒ This addon by Astralis brings the vibrant and bustling Boca Raton Airport to life with stunning detail and realism. Situated on 214 acres in South Florida, this public general aviation airport features an updated layout, over 40 custom modeled buildings, and handcrafted surroundings. With wide taxiways, safety overrun areas, and a base of about 295 aircraft, Boca Raton Airport supports corporate, recreational, and flight training needs.
